content: this quick and easy super bulky blanket crochet pattern creates a stylish cozy blanket that is a delight to snuggle under the size is completely customizable so you can make it as a cuddly baby blanket or a luxurious large throw blanket featuring simple beginner-friendly stitches and an easy two-row-repeat this pattern creates a beautifully textured chunky blanket that s both soft and snuggly the pattern includes easy-to-follow instructions with diagrams and a step-by-step video tutorial
